channel.title: How to change shop options
channel.description: one of my shops has it that u need to play for 30 mins before u can trade him the npc is wayne and id of 581 some1 help plz id like to make it so theres no wait

item.title: How to change shop options
item.dc:creator: @deery50 deery50
item.description:
@deery50 wrote:

look in client.java for
} else if (NPCID == 581) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = shopid;

replace shopid with whatever the shop id is. if you get no results look for this
} else if (NPCID == 581) {
See if it says something about time. Maybe you would recognize a difference

Read full topic
